
# Debian Bullseye Runtime dependencies
## Stable repos
```
libegl1
libgl1
libgles1
libgles2
libfontconfig1
libgmp10
libhogweed6
libbinutils
libx11-6
libxfixes3
libxi6
libxinerama1
libxss1
libxcursor1
libxpresent1
fonts-dejavu-core
```

### Wayland
```
libxkbcommon0
libwayland-bin
wayland-protocols
```

### Audio
```
libsamplerate0
```
#### Pipewire
```
libpipewire-0.3-0
```

#### Pulse
Likely, you already have it installed. If you do it would be better to avoid trying to install it manually.
```
libpulse0
```
